attributes.action: recognise Parental Alienation Syndrom as a recognised form of child abuse
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: for too long now malicious parents who have residence of their children and are still bitter at their childs other parent have used an emotional form of brainwashing, this manifests in telling the child so many times how bad their other parent is that the child will believe they do not want any contact with the other parent, social services currently do not recognise this form of abuse and allow children to become victims of emotional abuse
